snippet.title: LORDS OF THE FALLEN - Announcement Trailer | Pre-Order now on PC, PS5 and Xbox Series X|S
snippet.description:
*Pre-Order* _Lords of the Fallen_ on PC, PS5 & Xbox Series X|S - lotfgame.info/preorder-YT

_Lords of the Fallen_ releases Friday 13th October.

A vast world awaits in all-new, dark fantasy action-RPG, Lords of the Fallen. As one of the fabled Dark Crusaders, embark on an epic quest to overthrow Adyr, the demon God. 

_Gameplay footage not final: Visuals are subject to change_

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/lotfgame
Twitter - https://twitter.com/lotfgame
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/lotfgame/
Steam -  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1501750/Lords_of_the_Fallen/
